Sentence: A year after Francie is born, Katie gives birth to a boy, Neeley, who will be her (Katie) favorite
Francie and Neeley have to go to work the summer after eighth grade graduation, as Katie cannot support them all
One day, she (Francie) and Neeley proudly present their first week's pay to Katie
Unfortunately, Katie allows Neeley to go back to school instead of Francie, since they can only afford to send one

The climax of the novel comes whenSergeant McShane asks Katie to marry him (Blake); he (Blake) is a good man who will make it possible for Laurie to grow up without hardship, and Francie and Neeley to go to college
